ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mopni.1 | |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mopntop | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 3 |  | #P_uniopn | |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ J ) -> U. A e. J ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ A C_ J ) -> U. A e. J ) |
